page.title: 19HOPE VALLEY COLLEGE
page.content: Hope Valley College is a Community College. It houses an 11-16 comprehensive which is the only secondary school in the Hope Valley. This school is one of the smallest comprehensives in the County with approximately 600 students. It also has one of the largest catchment areas. The College also has evening classes, a Golden Age Group and a group for the Housebound. Tertiary education is provided by the Sixth form at Lady Manners School, Bakewell; Chesterfield Technical College and High Peak College Buxton. The stage and hall of the College are often used by touring companies for theatrical performances.
